Text:
Great to see EZTV leading by example.....
 Thank you guys
thank you eztv cant wait for the seeders to come keep up the great work for us poor folks who dont have cable!!

No cable where I live, so thanks a million.
Just wish the episode was a bit smaller (60-100mb), takes me 20 hours to download the 350's.

Thanks eztv.
One quick question though. How come piratebay says there are 0 seeds, while utorrent shows ~7000 seeds and 10000 peers?

At Social and Zahg...

Cable? I still have cable (for like 5 for minutes), and will not, repeat, WILL NOT(!) sit through the commercials anymore.

Not only will they make you dumber for watching, or even subliminally listening to them... but the cable companies have decided to up the decibels of commercials so much so, that when listening to a show at normal volume, as soon as a commercial comes on, cover your ears. Sorta like at the theaters during the previews. They figure, "assault their senses, and we'll get loads of consumers..."

Today, I am calling Rogers Cable, and telling them to fuck off. Im sick of paying out the ass to have to sit through commercials. And those specialty channels, the ones you pay extra for, like AMC... those douchebags will turn an 1.5 hr movie in to a 3+ hour ad fest. 8 mins of movie, 5 mins of commercials every 13 minutes. 

Oh well, the good thing is we'll be taking the 60 we spent on cable monthly, to up our internet connection. Currently I can upload ONLY at 512kbps, that will change to 2Mbps and I can finally start to give back to this awesome community.
a big txs to eztv ...if i did d/l this and other shows i would deff always use u guys
a big shout out to AGENT.25i who is gonna give something bk......my d/l is only 250 kbs or i would do the same ....more like u on here plz
